SELECT ENT_ID, TYP.MNEMONIC AS TYPE, EXP_UTC AS EXPIRY, QTY, UOM.MNEMONIC AS UNIT_OF_MEASURE, FRM.MNEMONIC AS FORM FROM MAT_TBL INNER JOIN ENT_VRSN_TBL USING (ENT_VRSN_ID) LEFT JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL UOM ON (MAT_TBL.QTY_CD_ID = UOM.CD_ID AND UOM.HEAD = 1) LEFT JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL FRM ON (MAT_TBL.FRM_CD_ID = FRM.CD_ID AND FRM.HEAD = 1) LEFT JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL TYP ON (ENT_VRSN_TBL.TYP_CD_ID = TYP.CD_ID AND TYP.HEAD = 1)

npgsql
SELECT DISTINCT ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID AS ENT_ID, LOT_NO AS LOT, ENT_ID_TBL.ID_VAL AS GTIN, PROD.SRC_ENT_ID AS PRODUCT, MANUF.SRC_ENT_ID AS MANUFACTURER FROM MMAT_TBL INNER JOIN ENT_VRSN_TBL USING (ENT_VRSN_ID) LEFT JOIN ENT_ID_TBL ON (ENT_ID_TBL.ENT_ID = ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID AND ENT_ID_TBL.DMN_ID = 'ce5990db-2e2a-467d-a376-2a7b53481e84' AND ENT_ID_TBL.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) LEFT JOIN ENT_REL_TBL PROD ON (PROD.TRG_ENT_ID = ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID AND PROD.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL AND PROD.REL_TYP_CD_ID = '6780DF3B-AFBD-44A3-8627-CBB3DC2F02F6') LEFT JOIN ENT_REL_TBL MANUF ON (MANUF.TRG_ENT_ID = ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID AND MANUF.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL AND MANUF.REL_TYP_CD_ID = 'AC45A740-B0C7-4425-84D8-B3F8A41FEF9F') WHERE ENT_VRSN_TBL.HEAD = 1
